str2: Of time: when, after; of cause: since, because; otherwise: else. From epi and ei; thereupon, i.e. Since.

word: would not the offerings have ceased?
parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Plural
str2: A primary verb; to stop, i.e. Restrain, quit, desist, come to an end.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: To serve, especially God, perhaps simply: I worship. From latris; to minister, i.e. Render religious homage.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Middle or Passive - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: To cleanse, make clean, literally, ceremonially, or spiritually, according to context. From katharos; to cleanse.
Once, once for all. Probably from hapas; one time.
To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
(a) of time: still, yet, even now, (b) of degree: even, further, more, in addition. Perhaps akin to etos; 'yet, ' still.
The conscience, a persisting notion. From a prolonged form of suneido; co-perception, i.e. Moral consciousness.
